data.actual_result: You are unbannable and the group DM must be recreated to get rid of you
data.expected_result: A ban function would allow you to permanently ban an account from a group DM
data.short_description: impossible to permanently remove someone from a group DM in canary
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a group DM - Join the group DM in canary - Copy the link - Get kicked out - -Use the link to rejoin
